title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Exploring Pre-Service English Teachers' Identities Through Graphic Narrative Creation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can express their educational identity as a graphic narrative based on reflective self-examination.
Learners can explain ethical considerations when creating graphic works on shared/unshared identities.
Learners can create works that reproduce narratives of social minorities using multimodal composition strategies (text, image, layout).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
